snippet: The former interior minister and seven security chiefs face up to 15 years in jail over the killing of hundreds of protesters in the central towns where the Arab Spring began.
abstract: Tunisian court sentences former Interior Minister Rafik Belhaj Kacem and seven security chiefs to up to 15 years in jail over the killing of hundreds of protesters in the central towns during the Arab Spring.
lead_paragraph: The former interior minister and seven security chiefs face up to 15 years in jail over the killing of hundreds of protesters in the central towns where the Arab Spring began.

headline.main: Tunisia: Former Security Officials Are Sentenced
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Former Security Officials Are Sentenced
